CMP3\Content

Interface MetaInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:

MetaAbstract
public interface MetaInterface

Provides meta data information for fields of a table
That is meant to be used in xml field attributes like this <field name="header" type="text" format="line" meta="header">

Method Summary
